name: Cancer
description: Thethys, known as Cancer is the godess of familial warmth and protection, guardian of the oceans.

skills.name: Cancer's Dance
skills.description: Heals surrounding allies 3 times, each restoring HP equal to 100% of Cancer's ATK + 70 and removing 1 debuff.

upgrades.level2: The unit receiving the final heal gains 15% increased ATK for 5s.
upgrades.level3: Restores HP equal to 120% ATK per heal.

skills.name: Nourish
skills.description: Restores HP equal to 250% ATK to the weakest ally.

skills.name: Crab Shell
skills.description: When an ally drops below 30% HP, they gain Super Armor for 6s and a shield equal to 300% of ATK. It can trigger only once per battle.

upgrades.level4: Immediately restores 200 Energy when triggered. (Unlocks at Lv.261)

skills.name: Shelter
skills.description: Increases DMG RED of the nearest frontline ally by 15% during battle.

upgrades.level3: Increases that unit's M-RES by an additional 50%.

relic.name: Vanguard Crab
relic.description: Additionally grants the nearest frontline ally Crab Shell once at combat start.

upgrades.level2: Crab Shell increases the target's Armor and M-RES by 25%. (Unlock at Relic Lv.10)
upgrades.level3: Additionally grants all frontline allies Crab Shell once at combat start. (Unlock at Relic Lv.20)
upgrades.level4: Crab Shell increases the target's Armor and M-RES by 50%. (Unlock at Relic Lv.30)
